info.name: NOW GE Financial Offer Generator API
info.description: A collection of API endpoints for the Flask-based financial offer generation tool, based on the provided app.py file.

request.description: Authenticates a user and returns their details. Use `admin@example.com` with password `adminpass` for admin access, or `user@example.com` with password `userpass` for standard access, as defined in the dummy data.

item.name: Search

query.description: The search term for the item.
Set to 'admin' to include 'po_price' in the results. Any other value will hide it.

request.description: Performs a vector search for items. The search query 'q' is mandatory. The 'role' parameter determines if sensitive price information is returned.

query.description: The search term for the client's name or address.

request.description: Performs a vector search for clients.

response.name: Sample Client Search Result

item.description: Endpoints for searching items and clients using vector search.

item.name: File Generation

request.description: Generates a unique, structured filename for a new financial offer based on client name and item categories.
Generates a PDF financial offer. The response will be a file download. Use Postman's 'Send and Download' feature to save the PDF.

Generates an Excel (.xlsx) financial offer. Items will be separated into different sheets based on their `product_type`. If the user role is 'admin', the 'PO Price' column will be included. Use Postman's 'Send and Download' feature to save the file.

Downloads a previously generated financial offer file from the server's `data_storage/FOS` directory.

You must replace the filename in the URL with a valid one that exists on the server (e.g., one generated from an export request or retrieved from the activity log).

item.description: Endpoints for creating and downloading financial offer files.

item.name: Admin

query.description: Must be 'admin' to access this endpoint.

request.description: (Admin Only) Retrieves a log of all financial offers that have been generated.
(Admin Only) Forces the application to delete the existing search indexes and rebuild them from the source Excel and CSV files. This is useful after updating the source data files.
